name: @attendance-kit/deploy
description: AWS CDK infrastructure for attendance-kit clock table

scripts.deploy:local-all: npm run cdklocal:setup && npm run cdklocal:bootstrap && npm run cdklocal:deploy-all
scripts.deploy:local-db: npm run cdklocal:setup && npm run cdklocal:bootstrap && npm run cdklocal:deploy-db
scripts.cdklocal:setup: DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 localstack stop || true; DISABLE_TELEMETRY=1 ANALYTICS_API=http://127.0.0.1 DISABLE_EVENTS=true LOCALSTACK_ANALYTICS=0 LOCALSTACK_DISABLE_EVENTS=1 localstack start -d && localstack wait -t 30
scripts.cdklocal:bootstrap: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=ap-northeast-1 CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=000000000000 CDK_DEFAULT_REGION=ap-northeast-1 JWT_SECRET=test-secret-key npx cdklocal bootstrap aws://000000000000/ap-northeast-1 --force && sleep 3
scripts.cdklocal:deploy-all: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=ap-northeast-1 CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=000000000000 CDK_DEFAULT_REGION=ap-northeast-1 npx cdklocal deploy --context stack=environment --context environment=dev --require-approval never
scripts.cdklocal:deploy-db: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=ap-northeast-1 CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=000000000000 CDK_DEFAULT_REGION=ap-northeast-1 npx cdklocal deploy AttendanceKit-Test-Stack --context stack=dynamodb --context environment=test --require-approval never --no-previous-parameters
scripts.cdklocal:synth: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=ap-northeast-1 CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=000000000000 CDK_DEFAULT_REGION=ap-northeast-1 npx cdklocal synth --context stack=environment --context environment=dev
scripts.cdklocal:destroy: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=ap-northeast-1 CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=000000000000 CDK_DEFAULT_REGION=ap-northeast-1 npx cdklocal destroy --context stack=environment --context environment=dev --force
